juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Light beige fabric backpack
*   Black top handle of the backpack
*   Front pocket on the backpack
*   "sarana" text label on the backpack's front pocket
*   Vertical zipper on the right side of the backpack's front pocket
*   Small horizontal metallic bar on the left side of the backpack's front pocket
*   Two side pockets on the backpack
*   Black bottom section of the backpack
*   Metallic grommet on the left side of the backpack's bottom section
*   Large, open antique book
*   Gilded edges of the antique book's cover
*   Visible printed text on the pages of the open book
*   Red illuminated letters or markings on the pages of the open book
*   Red ribbon bookmark in the open book
*   Clear acrylic book stand supporting the open book
